members.name: totalSections
members.doc: number of sections in the program

members.name: totalSteps
members.doc: number of steps in the program

members.name: _id
members.doc: WixMedia ID.

members.name: sizeInBytes
members.doc: Document size in bytes. Optional.

members.name: url
members.doc: Document URL.

members.name: urlExpirationDate
members.doc: Document URL expiration date (when relevant). Optional

members.name: duration
members.doc: program duration

members.name: categoryIds
members.doc: filter by assigned categories.

members.name: fieldSet
members.doc: at the moment EXTENDED contains Participation object on top of STANDARD.

members.name: programRole
members.doc: filter program by person's role in the challenge.

members.name: slug
members.doc: filter by seo slug.

members.name: states
members.doc: filter by current state.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency code. Must be valid ISO 4217 currency code (e.g., USD).

members.name: formattedValue
members.doc: Monetary amount. Decimal string in local format (e.g., 1 000,30). Optionally, a single (-), to indicate that the amount is negative.

members.name: value
members.doc: Monetary amount. Decimal string with a period as a decimal separator (e.g., 3.99). Optionally, a single (-), to indicate that the amount is negative.

description:
Money.
Default format to use. Sufficiently compliant with majority of standards: w3c, ISO 4217, ISO 20022, ISO 8583:2003.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: invitationCount
members.doc: number of invited members.

members.name: joinRequestCount
members.doc: number of pending join requests

members.name: participantCount
members.doc: number of active and finished participants.

members.name: paymentWaitingCount
members.doc: number of participants waiting for the owner payment confirmation.

members.name: categoryIds
members.doc: assigned categories

members.name: contentSummary
members.doc: sections/steps general info

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: identity of the program creator

members.name: msid
members.doc: msid where the program was created

members.name: participation
members.doc: part of the EXTENDED fieldset -> info about the current person participation in the program.

members.name: participationSummary
members.doc: participant stats

members.name: settings
members.doc: program settings that can be updated by

members.name: transitions
members.doc: history of the program transitions

members.name: accessType
members.doc: visibility and join access

members.name: hideFutureSteps
members.doc: hide steps in the Pending state.

members.name: maxParticipants
members.doc: limit of active participants in the program.

members.name: resolveStepsInOrder
members.doc: allow participants complete steps in the certain order.

members.name: fields
members.doc: Array of projected fields. A list of specific field names to return. If `fieldsets` are also specified, the union of `fieldsets` and `fields` is returned.

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc: Array of named, predefined sets of projected fields. A array of predefined named sets of fields to be returned. Specifying multiple `fieldsets` will return the union of fields from all sets. If `fields` are also specified, the union of `fieldsets` and `fields` is returned.

members.name: filter
paging
members.doc: Paging options to limit and skip the number of items.

members.name: sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: trigger
members.doc: on which action rewards must be assigned.

members.name: seoData
members.doc: schema used by Seo team

members.name: slug
members.doc: challenge slug expression.

members.name: settings
members.doc: SEO general settings.

members.name: tags
members.doc: SEO tags information.

description:
The SEO schema object contains data about different types of meta tags. It makes sure that the information about your page is presented properly to search engines.
The search engines use this information for ranking purposes, or to display snippets in the search results.
This data will override other sources of tags (for example patterns) and will be included in the <head> section of the HTML document, while not being displayed on the page itself.

members.name: preventAutoRedirect
members.doc: disable auto creation of 301 redirects on slug changes (enabled by default).

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order.

members.name: state
members.doc: challenge state

members.name: children
members.doc: Tag inner content e.g. `<title> inner content </title>`.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Whether the tag is a custom tag.

members.name: disabled
members.doc: Whether the tag is disabled.

members.name: meta
members.doc: Tag meta data, e.g. {height: 300, width: 240}.

members.name: props
members.doc: SEO tag attributes/properties (name, content, rel, href).

members.name: type
members.doc: SEO tag type. Supported values: `title`, `meta`, `script`, `link`.

members.name: flexible
members.doc: program duration is fixed, every participant has its own start-date.

members.name: ongoing
members.doc: an endless program, owner adds steps "on the fly"

members.name: selfPaced
members.doc: endless or fixed program where steps are not limited by time.

members.name: specific
members.doc: program duration is fixed, all participants share the same time range.

members.name: description
members.doc: general program info

members.name: pricing
members.doc: single-payment price.

members.name: restrictions
members.doc: participant limitation, step-completion pace and etc.

members.name: rewards
members.doc: rewards to be assigned after reaching some of the program milestones.

members.name: socialGroupId
members.doc: connected social group.

members.name: timeline
members.doc: timeline type -> Self-paced, time-restricted.

members.name: format
members.doc: Video format for example, mp4, hls.

members.name: height
members.doc: Video height.

members.name: poster
members.doc: Video thumbnail.

members.name: sizeInBytes
members.doc: Video size in bytes. Optional.

members.name: url
members.doc: Video URL.

members.name: urlExpirationDate
members.doc: Video URL expiration date (when relevant). Optional

members.name: width
members.doc: Video width.

members.name: _id
members.doc: WixMedia ID.

members.name: resolutions
members.doc: Available resolutions for the video, starting with the optimal resolution.

params.name: programRole
params.doc: filter program by person's role in the challenge.
